1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The premiere of the real estate series examines the pros and cons of homeowner associations; tours mobster Frank "Lefty" Rosenthal's former home, which features a bullet-proof glass wall; and visits the exclusive Ridges community in Las Vegas.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Westgate Hotels CEO David Siegel and his wife Jaqueline Siegel discuss their planned mansion, which will be the largest home in America, when it's complete. Also: advice for a couple who are facing the loss of their home.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Do's and don'ts for first-time home buyers; a couple advised to short sale their underwater condos; and the success of Trump Las Vegas, a 64-story hotel-condominium.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Staging a home for sale; a discussion of credit, lending and debt, including how to handle debt collectors; and Veer Towers, which are residential condos on the Las Vegas strip.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: One man's experience attaining a loan modification; and the story behind the Little White Wedding Chapel in Las Vegas. Also: 1031 exchanges.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: How Zappos helped revitalized downtown Las Vegas. Also: the revitalization plan for the Boulevard Mall in Las Vegas.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: High-end real estate in Las Vegas; zombie foreclosures; and crowd-funding real estate.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Ascaya luxury community in Henderson, Nevada; energy-neutral homes; and reverse mortgages.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot:

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Fox News reporter Ed Henry discusses his experience purchasing a Las Vegas condo at a foreclosure auction. Also: the MGM Arena; and a luxury home that comes with a baseball field, basketball court, pool with diving platform and movie theater.

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi on home-related frauds and scams. Also: HOA foreclosures issues; and building homes for heroes.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Timeshare mogul David Siegel and his wife Jaqueline Siegel (Jackie) discuss the death of their daughter, Victoria Siegel, and how it changed their priorities. Also: safe rooms.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: How to protect one's self -- and wallet -- from sinkhole damage. Also: protection for tenants, when rental properties face foreclosure; and a Bermudian-style home for sale in an exclusive central Florida community.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Bob Massi Is the Property Man (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Lou Holtz reflects on the fire that destroyed his home. Also: a private air-park community with 248 homes.
